short_description: calgary glass railing is a fences & ornamental metal work company based in calgary, alberta, canada.
long_description: home-rail's urban glass railing system is streamlined and cutting-edge to differentiate it from the conventional glass railing systems. five and six foot high wind wall/privacy walls. our glass railing provides uninterrupted views of your outdoors. home-rail's double top railing's charm is in its clean lines and added sturdiness. home-rail can produce a stunning railing system solution to suit your home. all of home-rails railing systems are produced with high strength aluminum alloys and power coated finishing which assures sturdiness, weather resistance and colour retention. home-rail's railing systems are simple to erect utilizing pee-engineered components that snap and screw together. visit our calgary showroom today or contact us to learn more.

generated_description: home-rail's, legally known as glass railings calgary home rail ltd., is a company based in calgary, alberta. the company specializes in the design and manufacture of aluminum railings, deck railings, composite decking, vinyl decking, and various types of fencing. home-rail's products are known for their durability, low maintenance, and environmentally friendly features, featuring a powder-coated finish. the company offers a range of railing systems, including straight picket, wide picket, urban glass, topless glass, and wind and privacy walls. home-rail's products are designed for both commercial and residential use and are available for purchase directly from the manufacturer.
